projects.name: Abbey Park and Abbey Road
projects.author: Max Wilkinson
projects.shortDescription: This project simulates a model railway layout (00 gauge) called Abbey Park which is owned by John Polley. John Polley used to be a London Underground driver before he gave it up for a desk job in network control. He says: 'At least I have my little trains to play with and they are much less trouble.'

projects.name: Aldershot
projects.author: Glenn Mitchell
projects.shortDescription: This is a small layout that will be ideal for new starters.  The railway is small enough to fit on a single screen, but there are plenty of trains to keep things interesting and enough action for the signaller to keep him or her on their toes.

projects.name: Aldgate Junction
projects.author: Keith Hazelton
projects.shortDescription: This is the first released version of my attempt to re-create the complex triangular junction at Aldgate on the London Underground Network. Complex for two main reasons - the high-intensity of the service pattern and the fact that all crossovers are on level grade.

projects.name: Aldgate the Fantasy
projects.author: Tristin Lockheart
projects.shortDescription: This fantasy layout is based in a future where Aldgate station has all the services both Aldgate and Aldgate East had.

projects.name: Amsterdam Metro
projects.author: Bjorn Verzijlbergh
projects.shortDescription: I made the complete Amsterdam Subway system, made to fit in one screen (23in that is). I also included a timetable with 18 trains an hour (version 1) which already will give quite a challenge to guide them in the right direction.

projects.name: Antwerpen Centraal en Antwerpen Berchem
projects.author: Kris Gullentops
projects.shortDescription: This project gives the track layout in the vicinity of Antwerp Central and Antwerp Berchem in Belgium. Detailed information is provided in word documents in the zip file in both Dutch and English.

projects.name: Antwerpen-Centraal
projects.author: Krizar
projects.shortDescription: Simulation of the rail network south of Antwerp Central station in Belgium, includes branches to Lier via Mortsel.

projects.name: Bakerloo Line
projects.author: Keith Hazelton
projects.shortDescription: This layout is mainly self-contained with a minimum of trains appearing or disappearing off the map. The only exception to this is the Watford to Euston Overground service, more of which later.

projects.name: Barnham and Ford
projects.author: ROSDevTeam
projects.shortDescription: This is a representation of the small section of railway between Barnham and Ford, including the junctions to the East and West of the two stations. Services along this route are operated by Southern Railway with the occasional GWR service.

projects.name: Basingstoke
projects.author: Glenn Mitchell
projects.shortDescription: Basingstoke ASC covers the South Western Main Line from just North of Farnborough (Where Woking leaves off) to the other side of Worting Junction (South of Basingstoke) plus most of the Reading-Basingstoke line and from Worting Junction to South of Grateley on the West of England line.

projects.name: Beaver Lake
projects.author: BWJM
projects.shortDescription: This is a fantasy railway inspired by The Blue Line by Laszlo Geller (jrbugi). Beaver Lake has less trackage, but features multiple routes including local and express service.

projects.name: Berkworth Fictional Railway
projects.author: LemiCandy
projects.shortDescription: A fictional city operating trains to a coast, the capital city, with a commuter line also.

projects.name: Billericay to Southminster and Southend Victoria
projects.author: Anthony Sheehy
projects.shortDescription: This is a representation of the real-world line that serves Southminster and Southend Victoria.

projects.name: Blades Loop
projects.author: Matt Blades
projects.shortDescription: This is my first project on Railways. I thought that I'd experiment with track building on the already built Liverpool Loop. Therefore, the track is fairly familiar but I have added some extra track leading up to a fantasy station, called Blades Station.

projects.name: Bolton
projects.author: Tom Street
projects.shortDescription: This railway is based on stations of the old East Lancashire Railway and the Lancashire and Yorkshire Railway which swallowed it up.

projects.name: Brisbane City
projects.author: Dominic Hubert
projects.shortDescription: Part of the Queensland Rail network in Brisbane, Australia from Roma Street to Bowen Hills.

projects.name: Bristol Area
projects.author: Krizar
projects.shortDescription: This is a 'mostly' accurate representation of the area between Bridgewater and Bristol.

projects.name: Burdwan Town Bus Service
projects.author: Debjyoti Saha
projects.shortDescription: Burdwan is a small town located in West Bengal, India. Its schedule is heavy.

projects.name: Bury St Edmunds
projects.author: Oxalin
projects.shortDescription: The lines between Ipswich, Cambridge and Ely (exclusive), via Bury St Edmunds.

projects.name: Caltrain Peninsula Route (California)
projects.author: Yellow
projects.shortDescription: This is the Caltrain mainline between San Francisco and San Jose.
